title: China: Convenient Mercure Escape near Tianshan Mountains with Three Restaurants & Spa
description:
Located in the foothills of the Tianshan Mountains, this hotel is your gateway to Silk Road heritage and China's fascinating northwestern frontier. Offering elegant rooms with views of snow-capped mountains and Urumqi's cityscape, Grand Mercure Urumqi Hualing is a peaceful retreat, perfect for exploring the region's diverse cultural landscape.

Sample international favourites, Thai cuisine or Xinjiang local specialties at three signature restaurants or wind down at the onsite spa, which offers a selection of revitalising treatments. Just moments from the Xinjiang International Grand Bazaar (the world's largest) and Red Hill Pagoda, you'll be at the crossroads of ancient trade routes and modern ambition.
